page.title: 03ORMSKIRK HOSPITAL
page.content: The Hospital covers the West Lancashire and adjacent areas.The hospital has 450 beds and has all the usual facilities of a major hospital except neurology, patients being sent to Liverpool.Over the last few tears the hospital has grown and now has a Child Development Centre where handicapped children of pre-school age can be given both nursery education and have their problems continually monitored. In addition, parents of the handicapped are encouraged to participate fully in the life of the department.Th Hospital is now almost fully developed. It is extremely accessible on the eastern side of the town on the main road to Skelmersdale.
